translations: 黄包车（rickshaw 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Ironically, some of those people are not enthusiastic about banning rickshaws.
sentences.translation: 具有讽刺意味的是，其中一些人并不热衷于禁止黄包车。

sentences.sentence: Rickshaws are used as bike taxis in many parts of the world.
sentences.translation: 在世界上许多地方，黄包车作为出租自行车使用。

sentences.sentence: Rickshaws are not there to haul around tourists.
sentences.translation: 人力车不是用来拉游客的。
